snippet: Supporters of Mitt Romney waited for his arrival at a town-hall-style meeting on Monday at Stamco Industries in Cleveland. Seats were quickly filled before Mr. Romney took the stage.
abstract: Supporters of Mitt Romney waited for his arrival at a town-hall-style meeting on Monday at Stamco Industries in Cleveland. Seats were quickly filled before Mr. Romney took the stage.

headline.main: The Caucus Click: Arriving Early to See Romney
